message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-value item at a competitive rate.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but the price is a little high for me right now. Would you consider $9,000?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. I am unable to match the price you've proposed, but I am willing to negotiate further. How about considering $10,500 for the product?
I appreciate you working with me, Alice.  $10,500 is closer, but I'm aiming for something more budget-friendly.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $10,000 even?
